A

ALLY - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing a cell containing an allied critter.

B

BAD - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing an invalid bearing or cell content.

C

clone() - Method in class CritterSpecies
 
Critter - Interface in <Unnamed>
Interface Critter specifies an individual citter's sensory information and performable actions.
CritterInterpreter - Interface in <Unnamed>
Interface CritterInterpreter specifies the methods needed to load and execute critter behavior code.
CritterSpecies - Class in <Unnamed>
Class CritterSpecies manages all information that is global to a species of critter.
CritterSpecies(String, List) - Constructor for class CritterSpecies
Constructs a new CritterSpecies object the specified species name and behavior code.

E

eat() - Method in interface Critter
Signals that this critter's next action should be to eat any critter in front of it.
EMPTY - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing an empty cell.
ENEMY - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing a cell containing an enemy critter.
executeCritter(Critter) - Method in interface CritterInterpreter
Executes the behavior code for a critter.
executeCritter(Critter) - Method in class Interpreter
 

F

FRONT - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing a bearing of 0 degrees.
FRONT_LEFT - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing a bearing of 315 degrees clockwise.
FRONT_RIGHT - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing a bearing of 45 degrees.

G

getCellContent(int) - Method in interface Critter
Returns a description of the contents of a cell adjacent to this critter.
getCode() - Method in interface Critter
Returns a List containing behavior code for this critter, based on this critter's species.
getCode() - Method in class CritterSpecies
Returns the behavior code used by all Critters of this species.
getColor() - Method in class CritterSpecies
 
getName() - Method in class CritterSpecies
Returns the name of this species.
getNextCodeLine() - Method in interface Critter
Returns the behavior code line number where execution of this critter's behavior code should commence.
getOffAngle(int) - Method in interface Critter
Returns the off-angle (relative heading) between this critter and an adjacent critter.
getReg(int) - Method in interface Critter
Returns the value of one of this critter's registers.

H

hop() - Method in interface Critter
Signals that this critter's next action should be to move forward one space.

I

ifRandom() - Method in interface Critter
Returns a random boolean.
infect() - Method in interface Critter
Signals that this critter's next action should be to infect any critter in front of it.
infect(int) - Method in interface Critter
Signals that this critter's next action should be to infect any critter in front of it.
Interpreter - Class in <Unnamed>

L

LEFT - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing a bearing of 270 degrees.
left() - Method in interface Critter
Signals that this critter's next action should be to change orientation by turning left, 45 degrees counter-clockwise.
loadSpecies(String) - Method in interface CritterInterpreter
Loads and constructs a CritterSpecies object for a critter behavior file.
loadSpecies(String) - Method in class Interpreter
 

R

REAR - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing a bearing of 180 degrees.
REAR_LEFT - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing a bearing of 225 degrees.
REAR_RIGHT - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing a bearing of 135 degrees.
REGISTERS - Static variable in interface Critter
The number of integer registers available to each critter.
RIGHT - Static variable in interface Critter
A constant representing a bearing of 90 degrees.
right() - Method in interface Critter
Signals that this critter's next action should be to change orientation by turning right, 45 degrees clockwise.

S

setColor(Color) - Method in class CritterSpecies
 
setNextCodeLine(int) - Method in interface Critter
Sets the behavior code line number where execution of this critter's behavior code should continue in the future.
setReg(int, int) - Method in interface Critter
Stores a value in one of this critter's registers.

T

toString() - Method in class CritterSpecies
Return the String representation of this species, which is equal to the name of this species

A constant representing a cell containing a wall.
